column4: Tourism;China: Two Cambodian chefs have won silver and bronze medals in the ASEAN-cooking competition in Nanning
column5: China.------The event was held from 19-21 September 2019
column9: Taiwan and Hong Kong. The cook-off comprised of three disciplines: Asian cuisine
column10: European cuisine and processed food.------As a result
column12: two Cambodian contestants won two European Cuisine Medals.  Ngai Sok Heng took silver and bronze medal went to Lam Rithy.------Winning the medal is a true testament to the cooking skills of Cambodian students and chefs in promoting Food Quality and Service in Support of Food Development (Gastronomy) for Tourism in Cambodia.------RASMEI KAMPUCHEA
